Text: Anyone have the English Audio version...besides amazon.com ???

I can't think of anything worse than watching original WWII footage with awful American voices dubbed over it.

Subtitles FTW. L2 read plz.

The film is very good quality BUT is unwatchable without the English subtitles.  The narrator is speaking in English..as for the Polish and German speaking guest in the documentary there are no subtitles so we have no idea what's going on.

For some reason I couldnt get the subtitles included to work... but the link below has working subs
:D

http://subscene.com/english/A-Film-Unfinished-Shtikat-Haarchion/subtitle-419822.aspx
